    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EnergyNormaliser(AudioInputStream reference)
      Adapt the amplitudes of a signal such that the average power is the same as the one in the reference.
      EnergyNormaliser(double energyFactor)
      Adapt the amplitudes of a signal such that the energy changes by the given factor.
      EnergyNormaliser(DoubleDataSource reference)
      Adapt the amplitudes of a signal such that the average power is the same as the one in the reference.

    • Method Detail

      • getAmplitudeFactor

        public double getAmplitudeFactor()

      • getReferencePower

        public double getReferencePower()

      • determineAveragePower

        public static double determineAveragePower(AudioInputStream ais)
        For a given audio input stream, determine the average power.
        Parameters:
        ais - audio input stream for which to determine the average power
        Returns:
        a non-negative double representing the average power as energy per sample, i.e. the total energy divided by the total duration.

      • determineAveragePower

        public static double determineAveragePower(DoubleDataSource signal)
        For a given audio signal, determine the average power.
        Parameters:
        signal - a double data source for which to determine the average power
        Returns:
        a non-negative double representing the average power as energy per sample, i.e. the total energy divided by the total duration.

      • determineAveragePower

        public static double determineAveragePower(double[] signal)
        For a given audio signal and sampling rate, determine the average power.
        Parameters:
        signal - audio signal for which to determine the average power
        Returns:
        a non-negative double representing the average power as energy per sample, i.e. the total energy divided by the total duration.

      • apply

        public AudioInputStream apply(AudioInputStream ais)
        Description copied from interface: AudioProcessor
        Apply this processor inline on the given audio input stream. It is expected to work continuously, i.e. it should start providing audio data before having read all input data.
        Specified by:
        apply in interface AudioProcessor
        Parameters:
        ais - ais
        Returns:
        ais
